item.title: This Season’s “It” Shoe Fuses Last Summer’s Top Two Footwear Trends
item.description: Summer 2024 saw a resurgence of both the humble flip-flop and Y2K-coded jelly shoe. This summer, the trending style is a hybrid of the two. Here are the 11 best jelly flip-flops, starting at $15.
